ideas.title: The Bourke Street Bottleneck Breakthrough
ideas.premise: A giant knot of trams and Ubers is magically untangled by Dan Andrews, who reveals a previously hidden Myki card.
ideas.why_funny: Satirizes Melbourne traffic woes and Andrews' iconic status (good or bad).

ideas.title: The 'G' Groundhog
ideas.premise: A furry groundhog emerges from the MCG on Grand Final day, predicts six more weeks of AFL off-season.
ideas.why_funny: Parodies Groundhog Day with a Melbourne-specific sports twist.

ideas.title: St Kilda Pier Penguin Party
ideas.premise: Penguins host a rave on St Kilda Pier, celebrating the local council's investment in penguin-friendly infrastructure.
ideas.why_funny: Plays on the cuteness of penguins and the absurdity of a penguin rave.

ideas.title: Hosier Lane High Art
ideas.premise: A snooty art critic examines new graffiti in Hosier Lane, declaring it 'slightly better than yesterday's.',
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at art pretension within Melbourne's famed graffiti scene.

ideas.title: Four Seasons in One Day…Again!
ideas.premise: Two Melburnians dressed in extreme weather gear (sunscreen to parkas) stand under a cloud with mixed precipitation.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable to anyone who's experienced Melbourne's unpredictable weather.

headlines.title: Local government discusses new infrastructure project in Melbourne
headlines.summary: City council meets to discuss improvements

headlines.title: Melbourne sports team advances in regional championship
headlines.summary: Recent victory keeps hopes alive for title

headlines.summary: New jobs coming to the area
